en.cis_intro:
The Clinical Instrument Schedule (Revised) is a tool to allow
  mental health clinicians and researchers to assess a person's 
  mental health condition. It should take around 30 minutes to complete.
en.cis_demo-intro: To begin with, I would like to ask you about yourself and your background
en.cis_demo-generic-yes-a2: Yes, on one or more occasion
en.cis_demo-generic-duration-a2: Yes, it has lasted for more than 3 hours on at least one day
en.cis_demo-generic-cause-a4: Working too hard, including looking after children
en.cis_demo-generic-cause-a5: Stress, worry or other psychological reason
en.cis_demo-employment: What is your current employment status?
en.cis_demo-employment-a3: Studying at school, college or university
en.cis_demo-employment-a8: On a government or other employment training scheme
en.cis_demo-health-intro: I would now like to ask you about your health and well-being
en.cis_demo-health-appetite-loss: Have you noticed a marked LOSS in your appetite in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-health-weight-loss: Have you lost any weight in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-diet: Were you trying to lose weight or on a diet?
en.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-diet-a1: No, I was not trying to lose weight
en.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-diet-a2: Yes, I have been trying to lose weight
en.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-amount:
Did you lose half a stone or more, or did you lose less than this (in the PAST MONTH)?

(NOTE: Half a stone = 7 pounds or 3 kg)
en.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-amount-a1: I lost half a stone or more
en.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-amount-a2: I lost less than half a stone
en.cis_demo-health-appetite-gain: Have you noticed a marked INCREASE in your appetite in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-male: Have you gained any weight in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-female: Have you gained any weight in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-amount:
Did you gain half a stone or more, or did you gain less than this (in the PAST MONTH)?

(NOTE: Half a stone = 7 pounds or 3 kg)
en.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-amount-a1: I gained half a stone or more
en.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-amount-a2: I gained less than half a stone
en.cis_demo-health-gp-visits: In the PAST YEAR, approximately how many times have you talked to or visited a GP or family doctor about your OWN health? Do NOT include any visits to hospital.
en.cis_demo-health-disability:
Do you have any long-standing illness, disability or infirmity?

Long-standing means anything that has troubled you over a period of time or that is likely to affect you over a period of time.
en.cis_demo-health-illness: Do you have any of the following conditions? If you have more than one condition answer for the most serious condition.
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain: Have you had ANY sort of aches or pains in the PAST MONTH, including headaches or indigestion?
en.cis_demo-somatic-stress: Was this pain or ache BROUGHT ON or MADE WORSE because you were feeling low, anxious or stressed?
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain-frequency: On how many days have you noticed this pain during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain-duration: In total, did the pain or ache last for more than 3 hours on ANY day during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain-valence: Has the pain been unpleasant in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress: Has the pain bothered you when you were doing something interesting in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress-a1: No, pain has not bothered me
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress-a2: Yes, pain bothered me while doing something interesting
en.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress-a3: I haven't done anything interesting in the past week
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort: Have you been troubled by any sort of bodily discomfort in THE PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-stress: Was this discomfort BROUGHT ON or MADE WORSE because you were feeling low, anxious or stressed?
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-frequency: On how many days have you noticed this discomfort during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-long: In total, did the discomfort last for more than 3 hours on ANY day during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-valence: Has the discomfort been unpleasant in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress: Has the discomfort bothered you when you were doing something interesting in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress-a1: No, discomfort has not bothered me
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress-a2: Yes, discomfort bothered me while doing something interesting
en.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress-a3: I haven't done anything interesting in the past week
en.cis_demo-somatic-duration: How long have you been feeling this ache, pain or discomfort as you have just described?
en.cis_demo-fatigue: Have you noticed that you've been getting tired in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-cause: What do you think is the main reason for feeling tired?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-frequency: On how many days have you felt tired during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-duration: Have you felt tired for more than 3 hours in total on ANY day in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-push: Have you felt so tired that you've had to push yourself to get things done during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy: Have you felt tired when doing things that you enjoy during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy-a1: No, not tired during enjoyable activities
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy-a2: Yes, tired during an enjoyable activity
en.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy-a3: I haven't done anything enjoyable in the past week
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy: During the PAST MONTH, have you felt you've been lacking in energy?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-cause: What do you think is the main reason for lacking in energy?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-frequency: On how many days have you felt lacking in energy during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-duration: Have you felt lacking in energy for more than 3 hours in total on ANY day in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-push: Have you felt so lacking in energy that you've had to push yourself to get things done during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy: Have you felt lacking in energy when doing things that you enjoy during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy-a1: No, not tired during enjoyable activities
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy-a2: Yes, tired during an enjoyable activity
en.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy-a3: I haven't done anything enjoyable in the past week
en.cis_demo-fatigue-duration: How long have you been feeling tired or lacking in energy in the way you have just described?
en.cis_demo-concentration: In the PAST MONTH, have you had any problems in concentrating on what you are doing?
en.cis_demo-concentration-yes: Yes, problems concentrating on what I am doing
en.cis_demo-concentration-forgetting: Have you noticed any problems with forgetting things in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-concentration-frequency: On how many days have you noticed problems with your concentration OR your memory during the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-concentration-tasks:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS could you concentrate on all of the following without your mind wandering?:

a whole TV programme

a newspaper article

talking to someone?
en.cis_demo-concentration-tasks-a1: Yes, I could concentrate on all of them
en.cis_demo-concentration-tasks-a2: No, I couldn't concentrate on at least one of these things
en.cis_demo-concentration-distress: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have these problems with your concentration actually STOPPED you from getting on with things you used to do or would like to do?
en.cis_demo-concentration-duration: How long have you been having problems with your CONCENTRATION as you have described?
en.cis_demo-concentration-forgetting-import: Have you forgotten anything important in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
Yes, I have forgotten something important
en.cis_demo-concentration-forgetting-durati: How long have you been having problems with your MEMORY as you have described?
en.cis_demo-sleep-loss: In the PAST MONTH, have you been having problems with trying to get to sleep or with getting back to sleep if you woke up or were woken up?
en.cis_demo-sleep-loss-frequency: On how many nights in the SEVEN NIGHTS did you have problems with your sleep?
en.cis_demo-sleep-loss-time:
Thinking about the night you had the LEAST sleep in the PAST WEEK, how long did you spend trying to get to sleep?

Only include time spent lying awake in bed TRYING to return to sleep.
en.cis_demo-sleep-loss-long: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, how many nights did you spend 3 or more hours trying to get to sleep?
en.cis_demo-sleep-loss-morning: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you woken more than two hours earlier than you needed to and found that you couldn't get back to sleep?
en.cis_demo-sleep-loss-morning-yes: Yes, and I couldn't get back to sleep
en.cis_demo-sleep-cause: What are your sleep difficulties caused by?
en.cis_demo-sleep-gain: Has sleeping more than usual been a problem for you in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-sleep-gain-yes: I have slept more than usual but this is not a problem
en.cis_demo-sleep-gain-frequency: On how many nights in the SEVEN NIGHTS did you have problems with your sleep?
en.cis_demo-sleep-gain-time: Thinking about the night you slept the longest in the PAST SEVEN DAYS, how much longer did you sleep compared with how long you normally sleep for?
en.cis_demo-sleep-gain-long: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on how many nights did you sleep for more than 3 hours longer usual?
en.cis_demo-sleep-duration: How long have you had these problems with your sleep as you have described?
en.cis_demo-irritability:
Many people become irritable or short tempered at times, though they may not show it.

Have you felt irritable or short tempered with those around you in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-irritability-yes: Yes, I have felt irritable or short tempered recently
en.cis_demo-irritability-trivial: During the PAST MONTH, did you get short tempered or angry over things which now seem trivial when you look back on them?
en.cis_demo-irritability-frequency: On how many days have you felt irritable, short tempered or angry in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-irritability-long: In total, have you felt irritable, short tempered or angry for more than one hour on any day in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-irritability-long-yes: Yes, I felt this way for more than one hour on at least one day
en.cis_demo-irritability-shout: During the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you felt so irritable, short tempered or angry that you have wanted to shout at someone, even if you haven't actually shouted?
en.cis_demo-irritability-shout-yes1: Yes, but I didn't actually shout at someone
en.cis_demo-irritability-rows: In the past SEVEN DAYS, have you had arguments, rows or quarrels or lost your temper with anyone?
en.cis_demo-irritability-duration: How long have you been feeling irritable, short-tempered or angry as you have described?
en.cis_demo-hypochondria: Many people get concerned about their physical health. In the PAST MONTH have you been at all worried about your physical health?
en.cis_demo-hypochondria-serious: Do you find yourself worrying that you might have a serious illness like cancer, heart disease or AIDS?
en.cis_demo-hypochondria-frequency: Thinking about the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on how many days have you found yourself worrying about your physical health, or worrying that you might have a serious physical illness?
en.cis_demo-hypochondria-excessive: In your opinion, have you been worrying too much in view of your actual physical health?
en.cis_demo-hypochondria-valence: How unpleasant has this worrying been in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-hypochondria-distraction: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you been able to take your mind off your health worries at least once, by doing something else?
en.cis_demo-hypochondria-distraction-yes: No, I could not take my mind off these worries even once
en.cis_demo-hypochondria-duration: How long have you been worrying about your physical health in the way you have described?
en.cis_demo-depression:
Almost everyone becomes low in mood or depressed at times.

Have you had a spell of feeling sad, miserable or depressed in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-depression-recent: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you had a spell of feeling sad, miserable or depressed?
en.cis_demo-depression-recent-no: No, not in the past week
en.cis_demo-depression-enjoy: During the PAST MONTH, have you been able to enjoy or take an interest in things as much as you usually do?
en.cis_demo-depression-enjoy-recent: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you been able to enjoy or take an interest in things as much as usual?
en.cis_demo-depression-sad: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on how many days have you felt sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things?
en.cis_demo-depression-sad-long: Have you felt sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things for more than 3 hours in total on any day in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-depression-content: What is the MAIN thing that made you feel sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things in the PAST WEEK?
en.cis_demo-depression-content-a1: Family members, including spouse or partner
en.cis_demo-depression-content-a2: Relationships with friends or people at work
en.cis_demo-depression-content-a5: Your own physical health, including pregnancy
en.cis_demo-depression-content-a7: Work or lack of work (including studying)
en.cis_demo-depression-company: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you felt sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things, did you ever become happier when something nice happened, or when you were in company?
en.cis_demo-depression-duration: How long have you been feeling sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things as you have described?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-time:
I would now like to ask you about when you have been feeling sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things.

In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, was this worse in the morning, in the evening, or did this make no difference?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-time-a3: Sometimes worse in the morning sometimes in the evening
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-time-a4: No difference between morning and evening
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-sex:
Many people find that feeling sad, miserable or depressed, OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things can affect their interest in sex.

Over the PAST MONTH, do you think your interest in sex has increased, decreased or stayed the same?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-restless: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you have felt sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things have you been so restless that you couldn't sit still?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-slow: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you have felt sad, miserable or depressed OR unable to enjoy or take an interest in things have you been doing things more slowly than usual, for example walking more slowly?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-guilt: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS have you on at least one occasion felt guilty or blamed yourself when things went wrong, even when it hasn't been your fault?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-guilt-a2: Only when it was my fault
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-worth: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS have you been feeling you are not as good as other people?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-worth-no: No, I've been feeling as good as anyone else
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-worth-yes: Yes, I've NOT been feeling as good as others
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-hopeless: Have you felt hopeless at all during the PAST SEVEN DAYS, for instance about your future?
en.cis_demo-depression-detail-hopeless-yes: Yes, I have felt hopeless sometimes
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you felt that life isn't worth living?
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide-thoughts: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you thought of killing yourself?
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide-thoughts-yes: Yes, but I would not actually carry it out
Yes, I have had thoughts about it in the past week
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide-method: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you thought about a way in which you might kill yourself?
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide-doctor: Have you talked to your doctor about these thoughts of killing yourself?
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide-doctor-no: No, but I have talked to other people
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide-referral:
You have said that you are thinking about committing suicide.

This is a very serious matter. It is important you talk to your doctor about these thoughts.
en.cis_demo-depression-suicide-outro:
Thank you for answering those questions on feeling unhappy or depressed.

The next section is about worrying and anxiety.
en.cis_demo-worry: In the PAST MONTH, did you find yourself worrying more than you needed to about things?
en.cis_demo-worry-any: Have you had any worries at all in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-worry-content: What is the MAIN thing you have been worried about in the PAST WEEK?
en.cis_demo-worry-content-a1: Family members, including spouse or partner
en.cis_demo-worry-content-a2: Relationships with friends or with people at work
en.cis_demo-worry-content-a5: Your own physical health, including pregnancy
en.cis_demo-worry-content-a7: Work or lack of work (including studying)
en.cis_demo-worry-intro: The next few questions are about the worries you have had OTHER than those about your physical health.
en.cis_demo-worry-frequency: On how many of the PAST SEVEN DAYS have you been worrying about things OTHER than your physical health?
en.cis_demo-worry-excessive: In your opinion, have you been worrying too much in view of your circumstances?
en.cis_demo-worry-valence: How unpleasant has your worrying been about things OTHER than your physical health in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-worry-long: Have you worried about something OTHER than your physical health for more than three hours in total on any day in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-worry-long-yes: Yes, it has lasted for more than 3 hours on at least one week
en.cis_demo-worry-duration: How long have you been worrying about things OTHER than your physical health in the way that you have described?
en.cis_demo-anxiety: Have you been feeling anxious or nervous in the PAST MONTH?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-tense: In the PAST MONTH, did you ever find your muscles felt tense or that you couldn't relax?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-phobia:
Some people have phobias; they get anxious, nervous or tense about specific things or situations when there is no real danger. For example, they may get nervous when speaking or eating in front of strangers, when they are far from home or in crowded rooms, or they may have a fear of heights. Others get nervous at the sight of things like blood or spiders.

In the PAST MONTH, have you felt anxious, nervous or tense about any specific things or situations when there was no real danger?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-phobia-only: In the PAST MONTH, when you have felt anxious, nervous or tense was this ALWAYS brought on by the phobia about some SPECIFIC thing or did you sometimes feel GENERALLY anxious, nervous or tense?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-phobia-only-a1: These feelings were ALWAYS brought on by specific phobia
en.cis_demo-anxiety-phobia-only-a2: I sometimes felt generally anxious, nervous or tense
en.cis_demo-anxiety-intro: The next questions are concerned with GENERAL anxiety, nervousness or tension ONLY. Questions about the anxiety which is brought on by the phobia(s) about specific things or situations will be asked later.
en.cis_demo-anxiety-frequency: On how many of the PAST SEVEN DAYS have you felt GENERALLY anxious, nervous or tense?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-valence: How unpleasant has your anxiety, nervousness or tension been in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-heart:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Your heart racing or pounding?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-dizzy:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Feeling dizzy?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-nausea:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Abdominal discomfort or feeling like you were going to vomit?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-sweating:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Hands sweating or shaking?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-breathless:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Difficulty getting breath?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-dry-mouth:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Dry mouth?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-chest-pain:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Chest pain?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-numb:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, when you've been anxious, nervous or tense, have you had the following symptom:

Numbness or tingling in hands or feet?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-long: Have you felt anxious, nervous or tense for more than 3 hours in total on any day in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-long-a2: Yes, more than 3 hours on at least one day
en.cis_demo-anxiety-duration: How long have you had these feelings of general anxiety, nervousness or tension, as you have described?
en.cis_demo-phobia:
Sometimes people  AVOID  a specific situation or thing because they have a phobia about it. For instance, some people avoid eating in public or avoid going to busy places because it would make them feel nervous or anxious.

In the PAST MONTH, have you  AVOIDED  any situation or thing because it would have made you feel nervous or anxious, even though there was no real danger?
en.cis_demo-phobia_type:
Here is a list of things that some people feel nervous about.

Which one of these are you MOST afraid of?
en.cis_demo-phobia_type-a1: Travelling alone by bus or train
en.cis_demo-phobia_type-a3: Eating or speaking in front of strangers
en.cis_demo-phobia_type-a9: I am not frightened of anything on this list but I am frightened of something else
en.cis_demo-phobia-frequency: On how many of the PAST SEVEN DAYS have you felt nervous or anxious about the situation or thing you are most frightened of?
en.cis_demo-phobia-hearth:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this, have you had the following symptom:

Your heart racing or pounding?
en.cis_demo-phobia-dizzy:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this have you had the following symptom:

Feeling dizzy?
en.cis_demo-phobia-nausea:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this have you had the following symptom:

Abdominal discomfort or feeling like you were going to vomit?
en.cis_demo-phobia-sweating:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this have you had the following symptom:

Hands sweating or shaking?
en.cis_demo-phobia-breathless:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this have you had the following symptom:

Difficulty getting breath?
en.cis_demo-phobia-dry-mouth:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this have you had the following symptom:

Dry mouth?
en.cis_demo-phobia-chest-pain:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this have you had the following symptom:

Chest pain?
en.cis_demo-phobia-numb:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, on those occasions when you felt anxious, nervous or tense about this have you had the following symptom:

Numbness or tingling in hands or feet?
en.cis_demo-phobia-avoid: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you AVOIDED any situations or things because it would have made you feel anxious, nervous or tense, even though there was no real danger?
en.cis_demo-phobia-avoid-frequency: How many times have you avoided such situations or things in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-phobia-duration: How long have you been having these feelings about the situations or things as you have just described?
en.cis_demo-panic: Thinking about the PAST MONTH, did your anxiety or tension ever get so bad that you got in a panic, for instance make you feel that you might collapse or lose control unless you did something about it?
en.cis_demo-panic-no: No, my anxiety never got that bad
en.cis_demo-panic-frequency: How often has this panic happened in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-panic-frequency-a1: Not in the past seven days
en.cis_demo-panic-valence: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, how unpleasant have these feelings of panic been?
en.cis_demo-panic-long: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, did the worst of these panics last for longer than 10 minutes?
en.cis_demo-panic-sudden: Do these panics start suddenly so you are at maximum anxiety within a few minutes?
en.cis_demo-panic-heart:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did your heart beat harder or speed up?
en.cis_demo-panic-sweat:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you have sweaty or clammy hands?
en.cis_demo-panic-shake:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Were you trembling or shaking?
en.cis_demo-panic-breathless:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you have shortness of breath or difficulty breathing?
en.cis_demo-panic-choke:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you have a choking sensation?
en.cis_demo-panic-chest-pain:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you have pain, pressure or discomfort in your chest?
en.cis_demo-panic-nausea:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you have abdominal discomfort or feel like you were going to vomit?
en.cis_demo-panic-dizzy:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you feel dizzy, unsteady, lightheaded or faint?
en.cis_demo-panic-derealization:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did things around you feel strange, unreal or detached  OR  did you feel outside or detached from yourself?
en.cis_demo-panic-crazy:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you fear that you were losing control or going crazy?
en.cis_demo-panic-dying:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you fear that you were dying?
en.cis_demo-panic-tingling:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you have tingling or numbness in parts of your body?
en.cis_demo-panic-chills:
In the PAST SEVEN DAYS when you had these panics:

Did you have hot flushes or chills?
en.cis_demo-panic-specific: Is this panic ALWAYS brought on by specific situations or things?
en.cis_demo-panic-duration: How long have you been having these feelings of panic as you have described?
en.cis_demo-anxiety-outro: Thank you for answering those questions on anxiety and worry.
en.cis_demo-compulsions: In the PAST MONTH, did you find that you kept on doing things over and over again when you knew you had already done them, for instance checking things like taps, or washing yourself when you had already done so?
en.cis_demo-compulsions-frequency: On how many days in the PAST SEVEN DAYS did you find yourself doing things over again that you had already done?
en.cis_demo-compulsions-control: During the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you tried to stop yourself repeating things over again?
en.cis_demo-compulsions-control-a1: No, not in the past week
en.cis_demo-compulsions-control-a2: Yes, on at least one occasion
en.cis_demo-compulsions-valence: Has repeating things over again made you upset or annoyed with yourself in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-compulsions-valence-a2: Yes, it has upset or annoyed me
en.cis_demo-compulsions-repeats: In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, what is the GREATEST NUMBER of times you repeated something you had already done?
en.cis_demo-compulsions-duration: How long have you been repeating things that you have already done in the way you have described?
en.cis_demo-obsessions: In the PAST MONTH, did you have any thoughts or ideas over and over again that you found unpleasant and would prefer not to think about, that still kept coming into your mind?
en.cis_demo-obsessions-repeat: Are these the SAME thoughts or ideas over and over again, or are you worrying about something in GENERAL?
en.cis_demo-obsessions-repeat-a1: The same thoughts or ideas over and over again
en.cis_demo-obsessions-frequency: On how many days in the PAST SEVEN DAYS have you had these unpleasant thoughts?
en.cis_demo-obsessions-control: During the PAST SEVEN DAYS, have you tried to stop yourself thinking any of these thoughts?
en.cis_demo-obsessions-control-a1: No, not in the past week
en.cis_demo-obsessions-control-a2: Yes, I have tried to stop these thoughts at least once
en.cis_demo-obsessions-valence: Have you become upset or annoyed with yourself when you have had these thoughts in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-obsessions-valence-a2: Yes, they have upset or annoyed me in the past week
en.cis_demo-obsessions-long: What is the longest time you have spent thinking these thoughts, in the PAST SEVEN DAYS?
en.cis_demo-obsessions-duration: How long have you been having these thoughts in the way which you have described?
en.cis_demo-overall-follow-up:
How have ALL of these things that you have told me about affected you overall?

In the PAST SEVEN DAYS, has the way you have been feeling actually STOPPED you from getting on with the tasks and activities you used to do or would like to do?
en.cis_demo-overall-follow-up-a2: They have made things more difficult but I get everything done
en.cis_demo-overall-follow-up-a4: They have stopped more than one activity

pt-br.cis_intro:
O Clinical Instrument Schedule (Revised) é uma ferramenta que
 permite que médicos e pesquisadores de saúde mental avaliem a
 condição de saúde mental de uma pessoa. Deve levar cerca de 30 minutos para ser concluído.
pt-br.cis_demo-intro: Para começar, gostaria de perguntar sobre você e sua experiência
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-yes-a2: Sim, em pelo menos uma ocasião
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-duration-a2: Sim, durou mais de 3 horas em pelo menos um dia
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-duration-a4: Entre duas semanas e seis meses
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-duration-a5: Entre seis meses e um ano
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-duration-a6: Entre um ano e dois anos
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-duration-a7: Entre dois anos e cinco anos
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-cause-a4: Excesso de trabalho (incluindo tarefas domésticas e cuidar de crianças)
pt-br.cis_demo-generic-cause-a5: Estresse, preocupações ou outras razões psicológicas
pt-br.cis_demo-sex: Você possui gênero masculino ou feminino?
pt-br.cis_demo-marital: Qual é o seu estado conjugal?
pt-br.cis_demo-employment: Qual o seu estado laboral atual?
pt-br.cis_demo-employment-a8: Em treinamento em algum órgão público ou privado
pt-br.cis_demo-housing: Qual é a sua situação de moradia?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-intro: Gostaria de perguntar sobre sua saúde e bem-estar
pt-br.cis_demo-health-appetite-loss: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) notou uma diminuição significativa no seu apetite?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-loss: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) perdeu peso?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-diet: O(a) Sr(a) está tentando perder peso ou está de dieta?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-diet-a1: Não, eu não estou tentando perder peso
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-diet-a2: Sim, eu estou tentando perder peso
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-loss-amount: O(a) Sr(a) perdeu 3,0kg ou mais nos últimos 30 dias ou perdeu menos que isso?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-appetite-gain: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) notou um aumento significativo no seu apetite?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-male: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) ganhou peso?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-female: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) ganhou peso?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-weight-gain-amount: O(a) Sr(a) ganhou 3,0kg nos últimos 30 dias ou mais que isso?
pt-br.cis_demo-health-gp-visits: No último ano, aproximadamente quantas vezes você foi ao clínico geral ou médico da família para cuidar da SUA saúde? Não inclua nenhuma visita hospitalar.
pt-br.cis_demo-health-disability:
Você tem alguma doença, enfermidade ou incapacidade de longa data?

Longa data significa algum problema que tem lhe afetado há muito tempo ou pode lhe afetar por muito tempo.
pt-br.cis_demo-health-illness: Você tem alguma das condições abaixo? Se tiver mais de uma das condições, responda pela mais grave.
pt-br.cis_demo-health-illness-a4: Doença cardíaca ou problemas de coração
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain: Durante os últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) teve algum tipo dor que lhe incomodou, como por exemplo, dor de cabeça ou indigestão?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-stress: Essa dor apareceu ou piorou porque o(a) Sr(a) estava se sentindo para baixo, ansioso(a) ou estressado(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain-frequency: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) sentiu dor?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain-duration: Nos últimos 7 dias, essa dor durou mais que 3 horas no total em algum dia/naquele dia?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain-valence: Nos últimos 7 dias, essa dor foi desagradável?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress: Nos últimos 7 dias, essa dor lhe incomodou quando o(a) Sr(a) estava fazendo alguma coisa interessante?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress-a1: Não, a dor não tem me incomodado
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress-a2: Sim, a dor me incomodou enquanto fazia algo interessante
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-pain-distress-a3: Não fiz nada interessante na última semana
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu preocupado com algum desconforto físico?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-stress: Esse desconforto apareceu ou piorou porque o(a) Sr(a) estava se sentindo para baixo, ansioso(a) ou estressado(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-frequency: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) sentiu desconforto?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-long: Nos últimos 7 dias, esse desconforto durou mais de 3 horas no total em algum dia ou naquele dia?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-valence: Nos últimos 7 dias, esse desconforto foi desagradável?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress: Nos últimos 7 dias, esse desconforto lhe incomodou quando o(a) Sr(a) estava fazendo alguma coisa interessante?
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress-a1: Não, o desconforto não tem me incomodado
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress-a2: Sim, o desconforto me incomodou enquanto eu estava fazendo alguma coisa interessante
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-discomfort-distress-a3: Não fiz nada interessante na última semana
pt-br.cis_demo-somatic-duration: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem sentido essa dor/desconforto do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) vem se sentindo cansado?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-cause: O que o senhor acha que é a causa principal desse cansaço?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-frequency: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu cansado(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-duration: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu cansado por mais de 3 horas em algum desses dias? Exclua o tempo gasto dormindo?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-push: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu tão cansado(a) que precisou se esforçar para realizas as suas atividades?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu cansando quando fazia coisas que gosta?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy-a1: Não, não me senti cansado durante algo que gosto
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy-a2: Sim, me senti cansado durante algo que gosto
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-tired-enjoy-a3: Não fiz nada que gosto na última semana
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu com menos energia?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-cause: Qual o(a) Sr(a) acha que é a principal causa dessa falta de energia?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-frequency: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu com menos energia?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-duration: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu com menos energia por mais de 3 horas, no total em algum dia? Exclua o tempo gasto dormindo.
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-push: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu tão com menos energia que precisou se esforçar para realizar as suas atividades?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu com menos energia quando fazia coisas que gosta?
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy-a1: Não me senti com menos energia durante algo que gosto
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy-a2: Sim, me senti com menos energia durante algo que gosto
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-energy-enjoy-a3: Não fiz nada que gosto na última semana
pt-br.cis_demo-fatigue-duration: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem se sentido com menos energia do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) teve dificuldade para se concentrar no que estava fazendo?
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-forgetting: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) teve problema de memória ou de esquecimento?
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-frequency: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) teve problemas de concentração ou de memória?
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-tasks:
Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) conseguiu se concentrar em todos os seguintes sem sua mente se distrair:

assistir um programa de TV

ler um jornal 

conversar com alguém.
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-tasks-a1: Sim, eu consegui me concentrar em todas essas atividades
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-tasks-a2: Não consegui me concentrar em pelo menos uma atividade
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-distress: Nos últimos 7 dias, esses problemas de concentração IMPEDIRAM o(a) Sr(a) de fazer coisas que costumava fazer ou gostaria de fazer?
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-duration: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem tido esses problemas de concentração do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-forgetting-import: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) esqueceu alguma coisa importante?
Sim, eu esqueci alguma coisa importante
pt-br.cis_demo-concentration-forgetting-durati: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem tido esses problemas de memória do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-loss: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) tem tido problemas em pegar no sono ou voltar a dormir quando o(a) Sr(a) acorda ou é acordado?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-loss-frequency: Nas últimas 7 noites, em quantas delas o(a) Sr(a) teve problemas de sono?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-loss-time:
Dentre as últimas 7 noites, pense naquela em que o(a) Sr(a) dormiu menos. Quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) gastou tentando dormir?

Somente inclua o tempo gasto na cama tentando pegar no sono
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-loss-long: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos deles o(a) Sr(a) gastou 3 horas ou mais tentando dormir?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-loss-morning: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) acordou mais de 2 horas antes do que precisava e não conseguiu voltar a dormir?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-loss-morning-yes: Sim, e não consegui voltar a dormir
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-cause: Qual foi a causa dos seus problemas de sono?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-cause-a2: Trabalho em turno ou trabalho até tarde
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-gain: Nos últimos 30 dias, dormir mais do que o normal tem sido um problema para o(a) Sr(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-gain-yes: Eu dormi mais do que o normal, mas isso não é um problema
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-gain-frequency: Nas últimas 7 noites, em quantas delas o(a) Sr(a) teve problemas de sono?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-gain-time: Dentre as últimas 7 noites, pense na noite que o(a) Sr(a) dormiu mais. Quanto tempo a mais o(a) Sr(a) dormiu comparado ao que normalmente dorme?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-gain-long: Nas últimas 7 noites, em quantas delas o(a) Sr(a) dormiu 3 horas ou mais além do que costuma dormir?
pt-br.cis_demo-sleep-duration: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem tido esses problemas de sono do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability:
Às vezes, as pessoas tornam-se impacientes ou irritáveis, mesmo sem demonstrar.

Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) tem se sentido impaciente ou irritável com as pessoas ao seu redor?
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-yes: Sim, eu tenho me sentido irritável ou impaciente recentemente
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-trivial: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) ficou irritado(a) ou furioso(a) com coisas que agora lhe parecem triviais?
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-frequency: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) ficou impaciente, irritado(a) ou furioso(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-long: Em algum dos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) ficou impaciente, irritado(a) ou furioso(a) por mais de uma hora no total?
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-long-yes: Sim, eu me senti assim por mais de uma hora em pelo menos um dia
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-shout: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) ficou tão impaciente, irritado(a) ou furioso(a) que teve vontade de gritar com alguém, mesmo que não tenha de fato gritado?
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-shout-yes1: Sim, mas eu não gritei com ninguém
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-shout-yes2: Sim, e eu gritei com alguém
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-rows: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) teve discussão, bate-boca, desentendimento ou descontrole com alguém?
pt-br.cis_demo-irritability-duration: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem se sentido impaciente, irritado(a) ou furioso(a) do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria: Muitas pessoas ficam preocupadas com sua saúde física. Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) ficou preocupado(a) de alguma forma com sua saúde física?
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-serious: O(a) Sr(a) fica preocupado de ter alguma doença séria como câncer, problemas de coração ou AIDS?
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-frequency: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) ficou pensando que poderia ter um problema sério de saúde?
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-excessive: Na sua opinião, o(a) Sr(a) tem se preocupado demais, considerando o seu real estado de saúde?
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-excessive-yes: Sim, eu tenho me preocupado demais
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-valence: Nos últimos 7 dias, o quão desagradável foi essa preocupação?
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-distraction: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) foi capaz de tirar essas preocupações com sua saúde do seu pensamento, pelo menos uma vez, fazendo outra coisa?
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-distraction-yes: Não, não consegui tirar as preocupações do pensamento nem uma vez
pt-br.cis_demo-hypochondria-duration: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem se preocupado com sua saúde física do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression:
Às vezes as pessoas se sentem tristes ou deprimidas.

Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) tem se sentido triste ou deprimido(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-recent: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu triste ou deprimido(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-enjoy: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) foi capaz de gostar ou se interessar pelas coisas como costumava fazer?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-enjoy-a1: Não, gosto menos que o normal
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-enjoy-recent: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) foi capaz de gostar ou se interessar pelas coisas como costumava fazer?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-sad: Nos últimos 7 dias, em quantos dias o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu triste/deprimido OU incapaz de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-sad-long: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu triste / deprimido ou incapaz de gostar/ se interessar pelas coisas por mais de 3 horas no total em algum dia?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-content: Nos últimos 7 dias, qual a principal razão para o(a) Sr(a) ficar triste / deprimido ou incapaz de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-content-a2: Relacionamentos com amigos ou colegas de trabalho
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-content-a5: Sua própria saúde física, incluindo gravidez
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-content-a7: Trabalho ou falta de trabalho (incluindo estudo)
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-company: Nos últimos 7 dias, quando o(a) Sr(a) estava triste / deprimido ou incapaz de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas, alguma vez o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu mais alegre quando algo bom aconteceu ou quando estava acompanhado?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-duration: Há quanto tempo o(a) Sr(a) tem se sentido triste / deprimido ou incapaz de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas do modo como o(a) Sr(a) me descreveu?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-time:
Agora, gostaria de perguntar sobre quando o(a) Sr(a) tem se sentido triste/ deprimido(a) ou incapaz de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas.

Nos últimos 7 dias, isso foi pior na manhã, à noite ou não teve diferença?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-time-a3: Às vezes pior de manhã, às vezes pior à noite
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-sex:
Muitas pessoas acham que quando estão tristes / deprimidas ou são incapazes de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas têm seu desejo sexual afetado.

Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) acha que seu desejo sexual aumentou, diminuiu ou permaneceu o mesmo?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-restless: Nos últimos 7 dias, quando o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu triste / deprimido(a) ou incapaz de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas, o(a) Sr(a) estava tão inquieto(a) que não conseguia ficar sentado(a)?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-slow: Nos últimos 7 dias, quando o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu triste / deprimido(a) ou incapaz de gostar / se interessar pelas coisas, o(a) Sr(a) estava fazendo coisas mais lentamente como, por exemplo, caminhar mais devagar?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-guilt: Nos últimos 7 dias, em pelo menos uma ocasião, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu culpado(a) por alguma coisa que não deu certo, mesmo não sendo sua culpa?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-worth: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) tem sentido que não é tão bom(boa) quanto as outras pessoas?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-worth-no: Não, me sinto tão bom(boa) quanto qualquer outra pessoa
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-worth-yes: Sim, não me sinto tão bom(boa) quanto os outros
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-hopeless: Durante os últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) se sentiu completamente sem esperança, por exemplo, em relação ao seu futuro?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-detail-hopeless-yes: Sim, me sinto sem esperança às vezes
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) sentiu que não vale a pena viver?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide-thoughts: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) pensou em se matar?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide-thoughts-yes: Sim, mas eu realmente não faria isso
Sim, eu tive esses pensamentos na última semana
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide-method: Nos últimos 7 dias, o(a) Sr(a) pensou em formas como se matar?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide-doctor: O(a) Sr(a) falou com seu médico sobre isso (pensar em se matar)?
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide-doctor-no: Não, mas falou com outra pessoa
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide-referral:
O(a) Sr(a) disse que está pensando em cometer suicídio.

Esse é um problema muito sério. É importante conversar com seu medico sobre estes pensamentos.
pt-br.cis_demo-depression-suicide-outro:
Obrigado(a) por responder estas questões sobre estar se sentindo infeliz ou deprimido.

Agora, gostaria de perguntar sobre suas preocupações.
pt-br.cis_demo-worry: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) notou que estava mais preocupado(a) com as coisas do que deveria estar?
pt-br.cis_demo-worry-any: Nos últimos 30 dias, o(a) Sr(a) teve alguma preocupação?
pt-br.cis_demo-worry-content: Nos últimos 7 dias, qual é a PRINCIPAL coisa que tem deixado o(a) Sr(a) preocupado(a)?

pt-br.cis_demo-anxiety-phobia:
Algumas pessoas têm fobias, isto é, ficam nervosas ou desconfortáveis com coisas ou em situações específicas em que não existe um perigo real. Por exemplo, elas podem ficar nervosas falando ou comendo na frente de estranhos, quando estão longe de casa ou em salas cheias ou podem ter medo de altura. Outros se sentem nervosos ao ver coisas como sangue ou aranhas.
